name: Participation at Mozilla
tagline: to have Mozilla succeed through openness and participation
body:
![Participate](https://wiki.mozilla.org/images/d/d0/ParticipationSmall.png)

# Mission

To have Mozilla succeed through openness and participation.

See more at our [wiki page](https://wiki.mozilla.org/Participation) and our [Discourse category](https://discourse.mozilla-community.org/c/participation).

# Mozilla Festival

![MozFest](https://2015.mozillafestival.org/assets/images/logo-mozilla-festival.svg)

## Pathways

**[Scaling participatory learning experiences](https://github.com/mozilla/mozfest-program/labels/Scaling%20Participatory%20Learning%20Experiences)** This pathway is for participants with enthusiasm for teaching and facilitating, who want to take that passion to create resources and programs that teach others through participation.

**[Leading and building community through participation](https://github.com/mozilla/mozfest-program/labels/Leading%20and%20Building%20Community%20Through%20Participation)** This pathway is for participants who want to deepen their practice on leading or building community, or who want to help people who are doing that.

**[New technologies for participation — challenge](https://github.com/mozilla/mozfest-program/labels/New%20Technologies%20for%20Participation%20--%20Challenge)**  This pathway is for people who want to take a technology lens through MozFest and build new participatory experiences with these technologies.

MozFest discussions on [Discourse](https://discourse.mozilla-community.org/c/global-gatherings/mozfest).

## Friday

Time | Content | Who
-----|---------|-----
10:00 - 12:00PM | Wrangler & community Summit prep | Just wranglers
12:00 PM- 1:00 PM | Lunch with Community Leaders | Staff
1:00  PM - 2:00 PM | Community Leadership Summit x 200 Participants | Everyone from Participation facilitating or not
2:00 PM - 3:30 PM | Facilitator Skill-Building x 400 participants | Everyone from Participation facilitating or not
3:30  PM - 4:00 PM | Break | 
4:00  PM - 5:30 PM | Participation Leadership Orientation & Kickoff | Everyone
5:30 PM onward | Space Setup & Sign Making! | Everyone not involved in science fair
6:00:00 PM | Science Fair | Science Fair leads and participants

Am Block 2 | 12:00PM | Mozilla Strategy | [Change the world through code: how to meet the person you need in your team to do so](https://github.com/mozilla/mozfest-program/issues/468) | [Tools for growing an inclusive diverse project](https://github.com/mozilla/mozfest-program/issues/261) | [Getting Started with Open Source](https://github.com/mozilla/mozfest-program/issues/452)
Lunch | 12:30 - 2:00PM |  Lunch
PM Block 1 | 2:15PM | [Building Federated Learning with Open Source tools](https://github.com/mozilla/mozfest-program/issues/409) | Mozilla Campus | [The Iceberg Model](https://github.com/mozilla/mozfest-program/issues/397) | [FlyWeb](https://github.com/mozilla/mozfest-program/search?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=flyweb)
PM Block 2 | 3:30PM | [Building bagde-based pathways to employment](https://github.com/mozilla/mozfest-program/issues/284) | Mozilla Campus | [Digital Literacy in the world of accelerating returns](https://github.com/mozilla/mozfest-program/issues/217) | [Publishing and Hosting on Github](https://github.com/mozilla/mozfest-program/issues/259)
  | 5:00PM | Lightning Talks
